front.title: YANG Data Models for requesting Path Computation in Optical Networks

abstract.t: This document provides a mechanism to request path computation in Optical Networks (WSON and Flexi-grid) by augmenting the Remote Procedure Calls (RPCs) defined in RFC YYYY. [RFC EDITOR NOTE: Please replace RFC YYYY with the RFC number of draft-ietf-teas-yang-path-computation once it has been published.
